claims.claim: WPP is the first ad-holding group to provide independent AI-powered marketing services
claims.quote: The ad-holding group claims to be the first in its category to provide this type of model.

claims.claim: Open Pro expands WPP's total addressable market by serving smaller businesses
claims.quote: This is about transforming how marketing is delivered, expanding our total addressable market, and giving more brands the tools they need to lead in the AI era.

claims.claim: Open Pro enables rapid content creation at scale
claims.quote: Following that, Open Pro offers AI-generated content creation, quickly spinning up brand-appropriate and channel-specific ads.

claims.claim: InfoSum acquisition provides access to the industry's largest cross-platform data source
claims.quote: giving WPP and its clients immediate access to the industry's largest cross-platform source of privacy-safe, actionable data for marketing intelligence, audience targeting, and AI model training.

claims.claim: Clients can optimize campaigns and see measurable performance improvements within hours
claims.quote: generating insights and audiences instantly, optimizing campaigns across the entire marketing ecosystem, and delivering measurable improvements in campaign performance within hours rather than weeks.

claims.claim: InfoSum enables clients to maximize first-party data value through privacy-enhancing connections
claims.quote: Allows WPP's clients to maximize the value of their first-party data with privacy-enhancing connections to data providers and media partners, powering campaigns across the entire marketing ecosystem

claims.claim: WPP has invested over $300 million in its AI-powered marketing platform
claims.quote: Over the past year, it has invested more than $300m in its AI-powered marketing platform, WPP Open, making it the foundation of its entire business model.

claims.claim: WPP Open has achieved 27,000 active monthly users
claims.quote: The number of active monthly users has reached 27,000.

claims.claim: WPP operates at tech company pace with 30 platform updates per day
claims.quote: The platform is updated 30 times a day – a pace that is more like a tech company than a traditional agency.

claims.claim: AI enables real-time creative testing and instant campaign optimization
claims.quote: Creative teams can now use AI to test ideas in real-time, planners can upload massive amounts of research and have AI summarize key insights, while media teams can generate and optimize campaigns instantly
